tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LivestockData (
  ID SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  livestock_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL,
  weight DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  breed VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  mother_id INT,
  father_id INT,
  last_vaccination_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Livestock (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  breed VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  weight DECIMAL(5,2),
  birth_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE BreedingRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  livestock_id INT,
  mating_date DATE,
  sire_id INT,
  dam_id INT,
  number_of_offspring INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (livestock_id) REFERENCES Livestock(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (sire_id) REFERENCES Livestock(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (dam_id) REFERENCES Livestock(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Livestock (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    breed VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    birth_date DATE,
    gender CHAR,
    weight DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE BreedingRecords (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    livestock_id INT,
    breeding_date DATE,
    breeding_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (livestock_id) REFERENCES Livestock(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProductionRecords (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    livestock_id INT,
    production_date DATE,
    milk_production DECIMAL(10,2),
    meat_production DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (livestock_id) REFERENCES Livestock(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Livestock (
    ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    Name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    Age INT,
    Breed VARCHAR(50),
    Gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE BreedingRecords (
    RecordID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    LivestockID INT,
    RecordDate DATE,
    Description TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT FK_Livestock FOREIGN KEY (LivestockID) REFERENCES Livestock(ID)
);

CREATE TABLE ProductionRecords (
    RecordID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    LivestockID INT,
    RecordDate DATE,
    Quantity INT,
    CONSTRAINT FK_Livestock FOREIGN KEY (LivestockID) REFERENCES Livestock(ID)
);

CREATE TABLE HealthRecords (
    RecordID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    LivestockID INT,
    RecordDate DATE,
    HealthCondition VARCHAR(100),
    CONSTRAINT FK_Livestock FOREIGN KEY (LivestockID) REFERENCES Livestock(ID)
);

CREATE TABLE Livestock (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    breed VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE BreedingRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    livestock_id INT,
    date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20),
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ProductionRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    livestock_id INT,
    date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    quality VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE HealthRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    livestock_id INT,
    date DATE,
    condition VARCHAR(50),
    treatment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE FeedRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    livestock_id INT,
    date DATE,
    feed_type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT
);
